metadata.title: CVE-2019-20391 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An invalid memory access flaw is present in libyang before v1.0-r3 in thefunction resolve_feature_value() when an if-feature statement is usedinside a bit. Applications that use libyang to parse untrusted input yangfiles may crash.

criterions.comment: libyang package in esm-apps/focal is affected and needs fixing.
